channel.title: Welcome to Not Notion on Not Notion
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to Not Notion on Not Notion

item.title: Example Post
item.description: You can use blog posts for announcing product updates and features.

item.title: Obsidian
item.description: Website: https://obsidian.md Category: Note-taking and knowledge management app Details Value Prop Obsidian is a powerful knowledge base that works on top of a local folder of plain text Markdown files.

item.title: Start Here
item.description: Reference pages are ideal for outlining how things work in terse and clear terms. Less concerned with telling a story or addressing a specific use case, they should give a comprehensive outline of what your documenting.

item.title: Fibery
item.description: Website: https://fibery.io Category: No-code product discovery and development platform Details Value Prop Fibery is a highly customizable no-code platform that allows companies to break free from constraints and create tailored workspaces for product discovery, planning, and development.

item.title: Appflowy
item.description: Website: https://www.appflowy.io Category: Productivity, Knowledge Management Details Value Prop AppFlowy is an open-source alternative to Notion that puts you in charge of your data and customizations.

item.title: Anytype
item.description: Website: https://anytype.io Category: Productivity App Details Value Prop Anytype is a private, secure, and open-source productivity app that allows users to take ownership of their digital life.

item.title: Capacities
item.description: Website: https://capacities.io Category: Personal Knowledge Management (PKM) Details Value Prop Capacities is an object-based note-taking tool that allows you to structure information as a network of interconnected thoughts.
